title: The Wallpaper of Blessing
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Your phone’s wallpaper is so cool, Setsuna-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you. It’s my current favorite superhero. What do you have as yours, Riko-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh? Mine is....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Do you promise to not laugh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Of course.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’s this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Is this.... a sheep? Aaah, it’s an alpaca!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah. It’s Otonokizaka’s alpaca. You see, I heard that if you set the Otonokizaka alpaca as your wallpaper, something good will happen to you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eeeh!? Is that real!? No, the rumor must’ve started because something did actually happen....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Do you want to set it as yours as well, Setsuna-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah, I’m a little bit interested!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. Then I’ll send you the picture. I hope something good will happen to both of us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah! I can’t wait to see what it will be!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
